001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint.Level;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import java.util.LinkedList;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
015import java.util.stream.Stream;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018
019/**
020 * Provides the means to aggregate multiple validation result sets into a single
021 * result set.
022 */
023public final class AggregateValidationResult implements IValidationResult {
024  @NonNull
025  private final List<IValidationFinding> findings;
026  @NonNull
027  private final Level highestSeverity;
028
029  private AggregateValidationResult(@NonNull List<IValidationFinding> findings, @NonNull Level highestSeverity) {
030    this.findings = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(findings);
031    this.highestSeverity = highestSeverity;
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * Aggregate multiple provided results into a single result set.
036   *
037   * @param results
038   *          the results to aggregate
039   * @return the combined results
040   */
041  public static IValidationResult aggregate(@NonNull IValidationResult... results) {
042    Stream<? extends IValidationFinding> stream = Stream.empty();
043    for (IValidationResult result : results) {
044      stream = Stream.concat(stream, result.getFindings().stream());
045    }
046    assert stream != null;
047    return aggregate(stream);
048  }
049
050  private static IValidationResult aggregate(@NonNull Stream<? extends IValidationFinding> findingStream) {
051    AtomicReference<Level> highestSeverity = new AtomicReference<>(Level.INFORMATIONAL);
052
053    List<IValidationFinding> findings = new LinkedList<>();
054    findingStream.sequential().forEachOrdered(finding -> {
055      findings.add(finding);
056      Level severity = finding.getSeverity();
057      if (highestSeverity.get().ordinal() < severity.ordinal()) {
058        highestSeverity.set(severity);
059      }
060    });
061
062    return new AggregateValidationResult(findings, ObjectUtils.notNull(highestSeverity.get()));
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public Level getHighestSeverity() {
067    return highestSeverity;
068  }
069
070  @Override
071  public List<? extends IValidationFinding> getFindings() {
072    return findings;
073  }
074}
